pr_title: Add error message and test for sqlcode -601

timeline.bodyText:
In Windows, this test (line 275) seems to fail because of the trailing single quote ' (at least removing it made the test pass).
On the Mac, this test passed fine without modification.
timeline.author: gjwatts

timeline.bodyText: On both Windows and Mac, this test (line 276) failed for me because of the mixed case of the word Fortune.  In the error message that comes back, it shows the table name as being all uppercase FORTUNE.  Changing the test case to look for the word FORTUNE allowed the test to pass.  Strangely enough, this test succeeds in both Windows and Mac when leaving the trailing single quote at the end of FORTUNE' (which seems to cause problems in the previous test).
timeline.author: gjwatts

replies.bodyText: Good catch, didn't have time to run this test locally before I opened the PR. Got it fixed now and CI is green
replies.author: aguibert

timeline.message: Add error message and test for sqlcode -601
Add error message and test for sqlcode -601
